🔐 Peek Password - Simple & Secure Password Viewer

Description:
Peek Password adds a convenient and secure way to view and copy password fields on any website. With a clean, minimal interface that appears only when needed, this extension enhances your password management without compromising security.

Key Features:
• 👁️ Secure Password Peek - Hold to view, auto-hides on release
• 📋 One-Click Copy - Instantly copy passwords to clipboard
• 🔒 Zero Data Storage - No passwords stored, ever
• 🎯 Site-Level Control - Enable/disable per website
• 🌐 Works Everywhere - Compatible with all websites
• ⚡ Lightweight - Minimal impact on page load
• 🎨 Clean Design - Unobtrusive buttons appear on hover

Security First:
✓ No password storage
✓ All operations performed locally
✓ No data collection or tracking
✓ No external connections
✓ HTTPS-only functionality

How to Use:
1. Enable the extension
2. Hover near any password field
3. Use the eye icon to peek or copy icon to copy
4. Manage site permissions through the toolbar icon

Perfect for:
• Verifying typed passwords
• Copying complex passwords
• Managing multiple accounts
• Checking saved passwords

Privacy Notice:
This extension operates entirely on your device and never stores or transmits any password data. Your security is our priority.

Support:
Questions or issues? Visit our GitHub page for support and feature requests.

Made with ❤️ for the privacy-conscious user.
